Articles.Content:
Would there be any interest in a parts pack dedicated to what would essentially be probe parts (.625m radial and inline?)

Would include more sizes of fuel tanks (half-size Oscar-B, double-size Oscar-B, etc, monopropellant tanks, xenon tanks, LF-only tanks), suitably sized parachutes, .625m heat shields, and .625m SRB's in varying form factors. It might include engines, if I can find some that stock doesn't have already. If I can figure out how to do fairings, it will include tiny fairings.

Edited June 13, 2016 by DaMachinator
SpaceY lifters adds an array of .625 meters srbs as well as 5m parts. I don't no of any such mods for LF parts.
Basically, the Procedural Parts mod covers all this (excluding engines).

Sounding Rockets has a bunch of things including a tiny aerospike ( it's more like 0.500 than 0.625 ). Things I'm missing ( some of which I started on ) were payload bays with doors - taniwha has a mod with one but it's not quite as useful as I wanted, more useful jet engines ( urg @ the physics though, I hate doing curves ), an enclosed docking port which I think would double as a nosecone, and stackable solar panels. I have a nice idea for the panels but I think modelling the crazy animation I had in mind is a bit beyond me at the moment... also I think some tiny RCS ports would be handy.

But hey if you want to build stuff, just build it anyway even if there's something similar around choice is good.
Ven's Stock Revamp and RLA Stockalike both already add large amounts of tiny parts, including tanks and engines. Might be worth checking those out before making an entirely new mod
